name: Tuna Loaf
author: broomrider
summary: An easy, pleasing recipe that is very economical to make and enjoy. I serve with chicken gravy at the table with mashed potatoes and a vegetable or tossed green salad.
ingredients: 2 (5 ounce) cans solid white tuna packed in water, drained
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
3 slices white bread, crumbled into fine crumbs
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix tuna, cream of chicken soup, milk, cracker crumbs, bread crumbs, onion, egg, and black pepper until thoroughly combined and spoon the mixture into the prepared bread pan
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the loaf comes out clean, 25 to 30 minutes
